front.title: XML Encoding of Data Modeled with YANG

abstract.t: This document defines encoding rules for representing YANG modeled configuration data, state data, parameters of Remote Procedure Call (RPC) operations or actions, and notifications defined using XML. GitHub Information (to be removed by RFC Editor) This document is developed on GitHub (https://github.com/netmod-wg/ rfc7950bis-and-friends). If you wish to contribute, please consider opening a pull request (PR). Please see the README file for details.
